subject: Regarding association of CGM (BOT) as one of the Member in 3 CGM Committees for conciliation of disputes-reg
text: HRd4 74t4 TTTANf nfetrrrut TT9 / Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (sc 4ar- a <TTHrf HAT4) Tax / Fax : 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 7fl-5 Qa 6, Raer-10, ERGT, T fcrft-110075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, Delhi-110075 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/Dispute Resolution & Legal Matters/2021 Policy No: 2.1.53/2021 dated 16th November 2021 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. NHAI/CMD/Conciliation /2021 (CompNo. 57979)} Sub: Regarding association of CGM (BOT) as one of the Member in 3 CGM Committees for conciliation of disputes-reg: This iswith reference to Policy Circular No. 2.1.52 dated 27.07.21 mandating CGM (BOT) to be an additional member of all the 3CGM Committees related to conciliation of related to BOT projects. disputes 2 It is to further mention that as per office order No_ 11021/02/2020-Admn/ (E19286/110431)/1381-Manual dated 14.10.2021 BOT projects have been again transferreddback to trespective technical divisions and accordingly Policy Circular No.2.1.52 dated 27.07.21 is withdrawn with immediate effect. 3. This issues with the approval of Competent Authority: ( Rsa ksk (Sunil Prakash Bhardwaj) Chief General Manager (Coord ) To: All Officers of NHAI HQ/ ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices to: 1. Hindi Officer for translation in Hindi 2 Library for hosting the circular on library site. 3_ Web Admin for circulation. HT RT RI 4T NHAI New Copy
